PLO1.title: Knowledge and Understanding
PLO1.refers_to: Foundational and advanced disciplinary knowledge with awareness of future professional and societal implications.

PLO2.title: Cognitive and Analytical Skills
PLO2.refers_to: Ability to analyse complex problems by integrating knowledge, evidence, and anticipatory thinking for ethical decision-making.

PLO3.title: Practical and Technical Skills
PLO3.refers_to: Ability to perform, adapt, and refine professional practices in accordance with established standards.

PLO4.title: Interpersonal and Teamwork Skills
PLO4.refers_to: Ability to collaborate effectively and ethically with diverse individuals and teams.

PLO5.title: Ethical Reasoning and Values
PLO5.refers_to: Ability to evaluate and uphold ethical norms, principles, and professional etiquette in decision-making.

PLO6.title: Systems and Holistic Thinking
PLO6.refers_to: Ability to analyse, evaluate, and manage interrelated systems and their long-term implications in professional practice.

PLO7.title: Problem Solving in Professional Contexts
PLO7.refers_to: Ability to analyse and solve complex professional problems using integrated and reflective approaches.

PLO8.title: Leadership and Responsibility
PLO8.refers_to: Ability to demonstrate leadership, accountability, and responsibility in professional and organisational contexts.

PLO9.title: Personal and Professional Development
PLO9.refers_to: Ability to demonstrate self-awareness, reflective practice, and commitment to personal well-being and lifelong learning.

PLO10.title: Entrepreneurial and Innovative Skills
PLO10.refers_to: Ability to apply entrepreneurial and innovative thinking to create value in professional contexts.

PLO11.title: Ethics and Professional Conduct
PLO11.refers_to: Ability to uphold ethical awareness, professional conduct, and responsible decision-making.
